about_the_game:
Embrace the Chaos


Embark on an epic multiplayer adventure in Steelbreakers, a 4-player hack-and-slash party fighter that takes frenetic action to a whole new level! Whether you're forging alliances or engaging in an all-out brawl, Steelbreakers promises an adrenaline-fueled gaming experience like no other.

Key Features


🤜 Dynamic Game Modes
Dive into a variety of heart-pounding game modes, each offering a unique twist to the battle. Challenge your friends in Stock Battle, defend against relentless waves in Survival, hunt monstrous beasts in Hunters, claim the crown in Kingmakers, and test your skills in mind-bending Challenge maps – custom-made dungeons inspired by legendary adventures.

🗡️ Weapon Variety
Select your weapon of choice from a diverse arsenal, each with their own distinct playstyle. Wield mighty swords, unleash rapid-fire projectiles, or surprise foes with tactical tools. The battlefield is your canvas – paint it with the chaos of your chosen loadout!

👥 Team Up or Face Off
Forge alliances with friends for cooperative mayhem or go head-to-head in a free-for-all showdown. The choice is yours! Steelbreakers offers a seamless multiplayer experience where speed, skill, and steel collide.

🌎 Dynamic Arenas
Immerse yourself in visually stunning and strategically designed arenas. From treacherous jungles to royal castles, each arena provides a unique challenge that will test your mettle.

🕹️ Solo Adventures Await
For those seeking solo thrills, Steelbreakers offers engaging single-player modes where you can tackle challenging AI opponents, conquer dungeons, and hone your skills as you strive to become the ultimate Steelbreaker.

🏆 Become a Hero
Rise to the top and claim your place as the ultimate Steelbreaker. Earn rewards, unlock achievements, and showcase your skills to the world. Do you have what it takes to break steel and emerge victorious?

Join the Battle Today
Whether you're a seasoned warrior or a newcomer, there's always room for more chaos. Grab your friends, choose your weapons, or venture solo into the fray. The battleground awaits – are you ready to BREAK STEEL?

short_description: Steelbreakers is a breakneck-fast top-down fighter for 1-4 players. Select your arsenal, hack, slash and shoot your way to victory in competitive, cooperative and solo modes. Fend off waves of monsters, defeat your rivals, or work together to explore dungeons and become the ultimate hero!
